title: The Pigeon That Took Rome (1962 - USA) [Charlton Heston] comedy
description:
The Pigeon That Took Rome (1962 - USA)

Comedy / War

starring . . . . Charlton Heston, Elsa Martinelli, Harry Guardino, Brian Donlevy
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056349/


Writers Guild of America - NOMINATED - Best Written American Comedy

Filmed at Rome, Lazio, Italy

A little bird tells on the U.S. Army during WWII in this farcical comedy. In 1944, during the last stages of the war in Europe, American officers Capt. Paul MacDougall and Sgt. Joseph Contini are sent to Italy to act as spies for the Allies, even though they have no experience in espionage. Working with Partisan resistance solider Ciccio Massimo, MacDougall and Contini send regular reports to their superiors by carrier pigeon.


Video: DivX5, 640x480, 29.970 fps, 1381 Kbps, 01h41m09s
Audio: MP3, 44100 Hz, joint stereo, 160 kbps

DVDRip, quality mediocre, widescreen but with black bars top and bottom

English audio with some German for which English subtitles are hardcoded
